examples.korean: I looked after a very brave two-year-old kid who had leukaemia. 발음듣기 나는 백혈병에 걸린 2살의 아주 용함한 아이를 돌보았다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. kaskas7911(kask****) Hansard
